name: nf5di

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w0, wal(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w0))

comment: Since the converse holds by ~ a1i , this inference shows that we can represent a not-free hypothesis with either ` F/ x ph ` (inference form) or ` ( ph -> F/ x ph ) ` (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2018.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 10-Jul-2019.)
